ComicInfo.Summary: Day of Blood Part One of Five: Responding to a call from Worf, Sisko leads the Theseus to Qo'nos, where Sisko's crew reunites with Worf's crew. Despite tensions between the two teams, they team up in an attempt to stop Kahless and his Red Path army from over-throwing Chancellor Martok and the Klingon High Council.
